discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABD
To enable click-to-call capability in Salesforce Lightning Service Console, you need to perform the following three configurations.

choices.B: Create a softphone layout and assign to user profiles.
choices.C: Install an adapter from AppExchange to work with third-party CTI systems.
choices.E: Enable Chat in their Experience Cloud Site to chat with an agent.
choices.D: Assign the correct Salesforce users to the Call Center.
choices.A: Assign the Salesforce CTI license to Salesforce users.

questions.question_text:
Universal Containers is using the Lightning Service Console for managing cases and wants to add a softphone to enable click-to call capability.

Which three configurations are needed for the softphone to work in Salesforce? (Choose three.)

Universal Containers has tested skills-based routing in a sandbox and is ready to deploy to Production.

Which two deployment solutions should a consultant use to ensure skills-based routing is operational in Production? (Choose two.)

discussion.content: Can someone elaborate on explenation of these options?

comments.content: Change sets will deploy the metadata changes, like the omni setup. However, what happens to the hundreds or thousands of records that are already owned or improperly routed? With skill based routing settings in place, an admin can mass-transfer filtered cases to the appropriate owners based on omni supervisor, on list views.

questions.question_text:
A recent review of customer satisfaction surveys revealed the support center does a poor job of upselling new products to customers. Customers report dissatisfaction when calling for troubleshooting, billing, enrollment, or similar issues and receiving a sales pitch. However, customers that have been upsold new products are two times more likely to remain a customer.

What is the recommended method to ensure upselling only occurs when customers are likely to be receptive to the offer?

Universal Containers wants to ensure the contracted service level requirements for its clients are being met.
What should be configured to meet this requirement?

comments.content: Why is B correct? Without the entitlement itself, the SLA can't be managed.

choices.C: Entitlement processes, contract line items, milestones, and entitlements
choices.A: Entitlement processes, contracts, contract line items, and entitlements
choices.D: Entitlement processes, milestones, milestone actions, and entitlements
choices.B: Entitlement processes, contracts, milestones, and milestone actions

questions.question_text:
Cloud Kicks (CK) provides customized support based on product line and plans to expand from voice-only support. Support agents are certified on one or more specific product lines.

CK would like to provide support through chat, social, email, video, and web and are striving for a consistent customer experience. Agents will be trained in one or two of the new support methods, in addition to voice support.

What is the recommended solution to meet the requirements?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Routing based on product and channel they are trained in.

Selected Answer: A
Live Agent is not longer the name for what is only one of the many channels mentioned in the Q

Selected Answer: A
specialized in one or more products = skills based routing
other channels such as chat, web, etc = Omni-Channel
